features: CLINICALLY PROVEN: Nice ‘N CLEAN Green Tea & Cucumber Skin Care Baby wipes are clinically proven as safe on sensitive skin. Trust these pH-balanced hypoallergenic wipes for gentle one-step cleansing and moisturizing!

STRONG & GENTLE: These wipes can handle the biggest messes your little one might make and made with 99% naturally derived ingredients and are free from parabens, phthalates, alcohol, chlorine, and dyes.
ENVIRONMENTALLY CONSCIOUS: Unlike other baby wipes, Nice ‘N CLEAN Baby Wipes are 100% plastic free and made from renewable plant based fibers from trees in environmentally managed forests.
WIPES WILL STAY MOIST: The convenient moisture-lock lid keeps the wipes from drying out! There are 2-packs of wipes. Each pack includes 100 wipes for a total of 200 baby wipes.
PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Nice ’N CLEAN Wipes are proudly manufactured in the USA with domestic and imported materials.
body.description: Nice ‘N CLEAN Green Tea & Cucumber Skin Care Baby wipes are clinically proven as safe on sensitive skin. Trust these pH-balanced hypoallergenic wipes for gentle one-step cleansing and moisturizing! Our wet wipes can handle big messes your little one may make. Our wipes are 100% plastic-free and made from plant-based fibers. They are also free of parabens, phthalates, alcohol, chlorine, and dyes. All our wipes are proudly made in the USA!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent and well made
reviews.reviewText: Wipes can be really pricey. I decided to try these. I use them myself, especially on hot days. I use them to remove extra makeup too. Nicely scented, and not super thick. Made well, with plenty of moisture. They do not rip or tear easily, or start to get fuzzy in the midst of using. That's something I didn't like with other wipes that I used for wiping my face down. Other brands fuzz up. These are just really good for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressed with these!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly, I wasn't expecting high quality with these, but they are of very good quality! I love the scent, they are packed in each individual package that when you go to pull one out, only one comes out instead of 8, lol! My granndaughters both have sensitive skin, but they have had no skin issues with this brand. I also like that they don't make their skin feel sticky or leave any type of residue when they dry. Very pleased with the quality of this product, and you can't beat the quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best thing to carry 24/7 ! EVERYWHERE
reviews.reviewText: They are really moist, they are strong, the smell divine!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean and fresh
reviews.reviewText: Gentle scent. This is my go-to for a mid-day fresh-up when I have been exerting myself away from home and can’t shower..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Serves the perpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: We originally purchased these wipes to use on the face of our infant because we didn't like the idea of alcohol wipes (from other brands) being used around her mouth to wipe food or other things.Now, we also use them when our toddler has diaper rash. The alcohol-free wipe is the only thing we can use that she doesn't cry when changing her diaper during those times. It's been a game- changer for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can’t beat the value of these. The quality is excellent as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these wipes for everything
reviews.reviewText: I order a big whole box and go through them fast. Always stay moist and smell good. My dogs love to be wiped down with them too!!
